name: Find your Future Laptop
about: Chuwi HeroBook 14.1-inch glare-proof screen brings you a wider view and is still clearly visible even in strong outdoor light. Besides, the night mode and color setting will help reduce the onset of eye strain With Intel's new generation Quad-Core E8000 processor and four threads, HeroBook enables up to 2.0GHz Turbo Boost speeds thanks to the 14-nm process technology and 5W ultra-low power design; the built-in HD Graphics N3000 graphics ensures faster image processing, hard-decoding 4K video. Herobook of 8GB RAM, 256GB storage helps you run multiple apps seamlessly..
